newsitem.title: USA: First Central Financial to delay 10-K filing.
newsitem.headline: First Central Financial to delay 10-K filing.

text.p: First Central Financial Corp said it planned to file a notification of late filing of its Form 10-K because it was in talks with its auditors and actuary over policy liabilities.
The company said it was discussing how policy liabilities recorded at December 31, 1996 were developed. It said it hoped to complete these talks in time to file before April 15.

First Central also said it expected to be able to pay interest of $220,500 due August 1 on its convertible subordinated debentures due 2000 but as previously reported, unless it obtained another source of funds, the company would be unable to pay the August 1 $1.84 million sinking fund obligation under the debentures.
